sentences.en: Also, the rapidly solidified layer unalloyed when the electrode ( Cu ) was set to be the anode.
sentences.cn: 此外, 以纯铜为电极 ( 正极 ) 时,则发现急速凝固层未发生合金化.

sentences.en: It was the unalloyed joy of a family table where the real feast was love.
sentences.cn: 这是一家人餐桌上纯情的欢乐,这道真正大餐就是爱.

sentences.en: News from Spain apart, last night's experience an unalloyed pleasure. All was well with the world.
sentences.cn: 除了巴萨晋级的消息之外, 昨晚我们收获的是纯粹的快乐. 一切都太完美了.

sentences.en: Seamless plain - end unalloyed steel tubes for fluid piping at elevated temperatures . Dimensions.
sentences.cn: 高温流体传输管道用非合金钢制光端无缝管.

sentences.en: Shall consist of no 2 unalloyed copper wire scrap nodules, chopped or shredded. Minimum 97 % copper.
sentences.cn: 由以下部分组成,2个非合金的铜线废料结, 破碎或者切片,至少97%的铜含量.

trans.tran_cn: 非合金的，不掺杂的，纯粹的，真正的
